{"id":1473160215,"question_id":3653,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"11 months, 1 week","timestamp":1733629413,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1473160215/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Subarray Sum With Length Divisible by K","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long maximumSubarraySum(vector<int>& nums, int k) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        long long ans = LLONG_MIN, sum = 0, ok = 0;\n        map<int, int> cnt;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            if (i >= k)\n                sum -= nums[i-k];\n            sum += nums[i];\n            cnt[nums[i]]++;\n            if (i+1 >= k) ans = max(ans, sum);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n\n    long long maxSubarraySum(vector<int>& nums, int k) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        long long curr = nums[0];\n        long long ans = -1e14;\n        vector<int> idx;\n        idx.push_back(0);\n\n        for (int i=1; i<N; i++) {\n            if (curr < 0) {\n                idx.clear();\n                idx.push_back(i);\n                curr = nums[i];\n            } else if (curr == 0) {\n                idx.push_back(i);\n                curr = nums[i];\n            } else {\n                curr += nums[i];\n            }\n            \n            bool ok = false;\n            for (int j : idx) {\n                ok |= !((i - j + 1) % k);\n            }\n            if (ok) {\n                ans = max(ans, curr);\n            }\n        }\n\n        return max(ans, maximumSubarraySum(nums, k));\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-subarray-sum-with-length-divisible-by-k","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":958}
